title: Working up: women at work in Australia
creator_credit: Trout Films, Maureen McCarthy and Chris Warner
brief_description: A documentary profile of nine Australian working women - a printing compositor, a flying instructor, an actor/singer, a computer systems analyst, a process worker, a shop steward, a stock drover, a surgeon, an apprentice motor mechanic and a union organiser. They are shown both at work and talking intimately about their work and their lives.
